description:
Step into a world plagued by the relentless march of the undead in a gripping battle for survival. 
     As chaos grips the city and the relentless zombie apocalypse spreads, you hold the fate of humanity in your hands. Equipped with your unparalleled sniper skills, you're humanity's last hope against the hordes of the undead.
     Features:
   ▪ Intense Zombie Combat: Engage in non-stop battles against stickman zombies, showcasing your precision and marksmanship to overcome the undead threat.
   ▪ Upgradeable Arsenal: Equip and enhance sniper rifles and guns as you face increasingly powerful enemies, building a more potent weapon collection.
   ▪ Diverse Challenges: Tackle a range of gripping missions that test your strategy and adaptability, offering escalating difficulty for constant excitement.
   ▪ Smooth Controls, Immersive Experience: Navigate chaos effortlessly with intuitive controls and experience heightened suspense through immersive sounds.
     The fate of the city lies squarely on your shoulders. Can you rise above the chaos, face the relentless onslaught, and become the legend that the world needs?
name: Zombie Sniper Shooter - Stickman War
